name: Pilot Brothers
description: The case of the stolen elephant! Elephant... Rare... Striped. ...has been kept for many years by an animal trader named Karbophos. Being unable to overcome abuse, it escaped and found a home at the zoo in our city. This is definitely Karbophos's work. To the zoo!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 minimum resolution, OpenGL support Storage: 490 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As a massive fan of point and click games, I have to say this is one of the worst I have ever played. I would skip this one and go for something else. 2/10
